septests module¶

Functions that return test sets for conditional independence tests. [1] D. Colombo’s PhD thesis (ETH Zurich #21445, 2013), Colombo-causal-learning-high-dimension-THESIS.pdf,

septests.get_adjs(G, edge)[source]¶

Find neighbors of a node in a graph, excluding a specified edge.

TODO 2: rename this function more appropriately

Parameters:
  • G – graph
  • edge – pair of nodes
Returns:

list of neighbors of first node, excluding second node
septests.get_fci_sep(G, edge)[source]¶

Find possible d-separation sets for final skeleton of FCI algorithm using procedure defined in [1], p. 30.

Parameters:
  • G – graph
  • edge – pair of nodes to test for d-separation
Returns:

cand_dict = dictionary of candidate d-separation sets
